articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: South Africa's ruling ANC is on the brink of losing its majority in a landmark election result - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Election officials have said the final results from Wednesday's election will be declared by Sunday, but it appeared they might now come in earlier.
articles.content: South Africa's ruling African National Congress was on the brink of losing its parliamentary majority for the first time Saturday after an election that brought a stunning drop in support for the par… [+3740 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Dean, David McKenzie
articles.title: Nelson Mandela’s party has been dealt a seismic election blow. Where does it leave South Africa? - CNN
articles.description: South Africa’s ruling African National Congress (ANC) party looks set to lose its majority for the first time in 30 years with results from 90% of polling stations.
articles.content:
Johannesburg, South AfricaCNN
